The accountant is the person driving the train. This gives a specific job linked to a mode of transport.

These statements help in placing lemonade relative to the roller and analyst.

## Step 8: Analyzing Statements 11 and 27
The person eating raspberry is on the right of the person eating pear, and the person watching satire movies is on the left or right of the person eating pear. This gives us a relationship between food and movie-genre.
